entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of thunderstorms late this afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 28 May 2016
